item.title: Cibo: A dog food that shovelers can't miss!
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: As one of the most popular dog food brands, Xibao’s strategic layout and development path has attracted a lot of attention since it has been ranked among the top selling dog food brands. In the Internet era, social media, such as live broadcast, short video, public, etc., has become a new development field for the brand. With the innovation and exploration of online channel operation, Cibo breaks the inherent mode of dog food sales, making consumers not only customers, but also friends, and becoming a group of warm-hearted family who love pets and life.

item.title: Dog mom gives birth to puppy, "sleeping posture" adorable master, can't put it down!
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: 2020-11-28 07:08:48 Source: Zhong Xin Chat Entertainment Report We are all irresistible to furry animals, they are very comfortable to touch, and they often give out some interaction to make their own defenseless, especially for girls, see these cute little guys are even more like, see the cute little life even lost soul, can’t wait to hide the cute little ones into their own arms. I’ve been very fond of dogs since I was a child, and they grew up with me, and they would always stick to me no matter what, and they would accompany me wherever I went.

item.title: First time owning a cat? Teach you 3 points to choose reliable cat food
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Nowadays, pets have gradually become an indispensable part of every home, and more and more people are paying attention to the nutritional health of their pets. However, the quality of the various products on the market varies, and novice shovelers are always worried that they will encounter mines and step on pits, not knowing how to choose the right cat food for their cat owners. You know, if you don’t choose the right cat food, your cat’s owner will not only suffer from various diseases, but also shorten his life expectancy.

item.title: Pet cat's saliva stinks, cat saliva stinks is a disease, 3 easy solutions
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: 2020-11-26 16:44:57 Source: Small Exhibits Big History Report If you have a pet cat at home, most people like to pick the cat up and kiss it. Many pet owners also find that their cats actually have bad breath, or that their saliva smells bad, and after licking their fur, the whole body smells like saliva. There are several reasons for this situation, which pet owners can compare and then deal with.

item.title: What is the best brand of dog food?
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Every dog shovel officer who brings home a dog, will love the cute dog. But for puppies in a new environment, the environment is already unfamiliar, and if the wrong dog food is chosen, it will directly affect the dog’s subsequent development. Choosing a suitable dog food for puppies is very critical, and an important way to continue the healthy growth of your dog is to choose a nutritionally rich and balanced, and safe and natural dog food.
